metadata.description: When Fourmille gets on her plane for New York, she has no idea how strange a direction her journey will take. In the middle of the flight, she is accosted by a strange creature who asks her if she accepts the inheritance of an aunt who disappeared 20 years ago. And after lightning strikes the 747, it is on a dragon's back that she lands in a very different New York! Deep in a fantastic Manhattan, she discovers the completely offbeat world of Ekho!
metadata.name: Ekho
